<div class="guidelines">
  <h4>Submission Guidelines</h4>
  <ul>
    <li><strong>Working package</strong> - The package should be installable and functional</li>
    <li><strong>Documentation</strong> - At minimum, a README explaining what the package does</li>
    <li><strong>Maintained</strong> - Package should be actively maintained or stable</li>
    <li><strong>Open source</strong> - Source code should be publicly accessible</li>
  </ul>
</div>

<h3>Already on CRAN or R-universe?</h3>
<p>Packages from CRAN and major R-universe organizations are automatically indexed weekly. Submitting helps us:</p>
<ul>
  <li>Categorize your package correctly</li>
